duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee all managerial and administrative aspects of construction projects, including estimating, scheduling, quality control, progress reporting, and design coordination.
Develop preliminary concept drawings and participate in proposal meetings with clients to review scope of work, reduce costs, and provide value engineering ideas.
Oversee the selection of subcontractors and conduct regular job site meetings to ensure project progress and safety compliance.
Prioritize and manage multiple tasks under tight deadlines, while communicating openly with leadership, team members, and interns.
Evaluate project-related processes and make necessary changes to meet/exceed internal and external client expectations, demonstrating commitment to quality.
Act with integrity, supporting the company's values, and maintaining a constant focus on meeting/exceeding customer requirements and expectations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in Civil, Mechanical, or Engineering related and/or Construction Management; with minimum of 3.0 GPA (Master's preferred)
